inclusion.criterion: Valvular aortic stenosis with a aortic valve area < 1,0 cm2
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: repeat echo confirmed critical aortic stenosis showing left ventricular hypertrophy with cavity dilation and severe global hypokinesis

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic aortic stenosis with stable angina pectoris
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic aortic stenosis with syncope at exertion
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic aortic stenosis with dizziness at exertion
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic aortic stenosis with previous pulmonary oedema
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients in New York Heart Association functional class II-IV
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: 48 M with a h/o HTN hyperlipidemia

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: carotid US (showing moderate heterogeneous plaque with bilateral 1-39% ICA stenosis)

exclusion.criterion: Any patient characteristic that may interfere with compliance with the study protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Unknowns include exertional syncope, dizziness, NYHA functional class, and patient's willingness to give written informed consent.
